item.title: Hiromi is here! and i just won a windows smart phone
item.description: So hiromi got here monday. it has been really fun. On monday I picked her up and we hung out around my house. Went to our friend becca’s house and hung out.Â It was fun. After that we went home - picked up chris - went to irazu and then went to the empty bottle to see becca’s husband’s band “just a fire.” It was good - but hiromi about died from jet lag.
